short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing your “Know-it-all” Study Sidekick! Dive into answers, master concepts, and soar academically with AI by your side.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Powered by advanced AI, The Coursology Chrome extension is an instant, accurate homework helper designed to help students in all subjects. Capture your question and let our AI solve your complex questions in subjects like math, biology, chemistry, geometry and many more!

Our Features:

Fast, step-by-step answers
All with a snap of a picture, we provide precise answers accompanied with detailed, step-by-step explanations right below the answer.

Support in all subjects
With our wide array supported subjects, find answers to complex problems in math, chemistry, physics, history and much more

Capture Methods
You can use our Button, Snapshot or Text Selection capture methods to answer your questions!

Personalized AI Chat
We don’t leave you hanging, still have questions about a topic? Use our AI chat feature, or the follow-up chat on the answer popup for any additional questions you may have.

Unlock better grades, With Coursology Pro you get:
Find unlimited, accurate answers
Step-by-step solutions
No waits, no ads
Access all Coursology features (Chrome extension, Mobile app, Chat, Lecture Listen, AI Study tools & more!)
